turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi there, can you pick up some coffee for me at Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! Which Starbucks would you like it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on South Academy Blvd in Colorado Springs.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what will your order be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A Vanilla Sweet Cream Cold Brew

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A venti please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Would you like anything special?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Extra sweet cream please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. What time would you like it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Noon please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, a venti sweet cream cold brew with extra sweet cream to be delivered at noon. Any other drinks or food?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, nothing else. Use my starbucks account

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, sounds good. Putting the order in now

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order is in. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good, thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Just to confirm, you wanted a venti vanilla sweet cream cold brew, extra sweet cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, it has been ordered at the Starbucks on South Academy BLVD at noon.

items.name: A Vanilla Sweet Cream Cold Brew
